summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 37004, creating Local Improvement District No. 3054, entitled: "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 25th Avenue South, from Holgate Street to Rainier Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5374 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", approved this 31st day of January, 1917.
